QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Redridge Mountains!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report Watch Captain Parker at Tower Watch in the Redridge Mountains.$B$BCaptain Parker's forces have come under attack from marauding gnolls and orcs. The people of Lakewood are in peril and your aid is needed to safeguard them. Travel east from the border of Elwynn Forest and into the Three Corners area of Redridge to reach Tower Watch.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Watch Captain Parker at Tower Watch in Redridge Mountains.
